document.full_text: actor and director jodie foster on wednesday defended her choice of mel gibson for the lead role in her movie "the beaver," saying she had "no regrets" about hiring him despite his personal troubles that delayed its release.
document.title: jodie foster has "no regrets" in hiring mel gibson
